texto: 5.4.3.2 In determining the consequences of the change, the following factors should also be considered: a) the application o f relevant statutory and regulatory requirements; b) the interchangeability o f configuration items and the need for their re-identification; c) the inter faces between configuration items; d) the manu facturing, test and inspection methods; e) inventory and purchases; f ) delivery activities; g) customer support requirements.
